profile.title: Hard-working designer / developer who loves to build innovative user experiences. Looking to increase my breadth of knowledge using cutting-edge JavaScript frameworks such as Angular, React and VueJS, while continuing to develop my existing skills in the field of responsive user interface design.
points: Keen awareness of the need for consistency and clarity in user interface design
Capable of working from own initiative and accomplishing both team or individual goals
Five years experience building and extending sites utilising Bootstrap
Experience using industry-standard applications including TFS, Jira, BitBucket, Photoshop
Fluent in HTML5, JavaScript, CSS3, C#, Python, PHP
Working knowledge of C, SQL, Git, NodeJS

education.description: Microsoft Exam 480: Programming in HTML5 with JavaScript and CSS3
Microsoft Office User Specialist (MOS) Office 2000 Word Expert (100%)
General Certificate of Secondary Education (seven passes at grade C & above)

experience.title: Software engineer
points: Front-end design and development of a modular mortgage and protection sourcing platform for intermediaries (SPA using KnockoutJS / Durandal)
Experience with Angular 1.x, including a responsive mobile site utilising the Ionic framework
Developed Python-based Selenium smoke tests for early visibility of build issues
Three years experience in an agile Scrum-based project
Proud member of the global winner team in the IRESS 2016 Hackathon
Developed VB.NET / C#-based Windows applications (console, WinForms and WPF) using MS Visual Studio / Blend
Polished user interface for multiple web projects using LESS, SASS, Bootstrap
Improved accessibility standards by ensuring WCAG2AA compliance
Workflow tools included Git, Gerrit, BitBucket, Gulp, jQuery

experience.title: Software engineer
points: Sole responsibility of front-end design and development of iTrak wealth management software
Development and maintenance of associated setup utility and help documentation
Design, development and maintenance of a series of in-house Delphi programs for a local company

experience.title: Software engineer / Webmaster
points: Application design and development of flagship products for the company, including a Windows-based personal financial package and a profit-related pay tax calculator
Design and development of various in-house WinForms applications
Set up and maintenance of peer-to-peer network
Design and maintenance of company website
Assisting with the inspection, testing and shipping of electronic hardware

experience.title: Junior draughtsman
points: Liaising with clients / architects on project requirements
Use of CAD system to produce both architectural and workshop technical drawings
Design, development and maintenance of several programs to increase the efficiency and accuracy of calculations within the drawing office
